column4: Kyle_ had to switch from Freebsd 8.2, just got tired of configuring Xorg, lack of drivers, community not exactly helpfull, all that jazz
Kyle_ i still run OpenBSD or Pfsense for work though
Kyle_ also majority of software not compatible with Freebsd out the box - software like GNS3 or FOG Imaging server, so that was major point to convert
Kyle_ will try to get myself some eyecandy  -where compiz :D
do i need to put default gateway in my /etc/network/interfaces ?
Kyle thats under iface eth9 inet **.**.***.** netmask 255.255.255.0 ?
gateway **.**.** ?
or is it default_gateway ?
Kyle_ i'll try
whers restart networking hmm no /etc/rc.d ?
you can try "sudo service networking restart" but it doesn't work all that great these days
lines i use with my static interfaces file http://paste.ubuntu.com/671176/
you failed on my nick the 1st time, you can use TAB to auto complete like "z" "y" "k" "TAB"
got it
what client are you using?
xchat
look on left side, around the channels for a "ubottu"
doh
that interfaces snapin - how to combine with iface eth9 inet 192.168.0.2 string ?
iface eth9 inet 192.168.0.2 is incorrect!  use "iface eth9 inet static" then next line starts with "address 192.168.0.2"
u solved it ))
